sentence__0: The selected birds are almost always large.
sentence__1: The selected birds tend to be black.
sentence__2: If the bird has a cone-shaped bill, it is probably an other bird.
sentence__3: If the bird is gull-like, it is most likely a selected bird.
sentence__4: If the wing pattern is not solid, then it's probably an other bird.
sentence__5: Most of the selected birds have a black crown.
sentence__6: If the tail pattern is not solid, chances are that the bird is an other bird.
sentence__7: If the bird is sandpiper like, it is most likely an other bird.
